hymn.title: Daniel was a child like me

layout.singingstanza: Dan -- iel was a child like me Who pur -- posed, yes, pur -- posed in his heart, Dan -- iel was a child like me Who pur -- posed, yes, pur -- posed in his heart. NO! NO! NO. NO. NO; My ves -- sel will not be de -- filed. NO! NO! NO. NO. NO; My ves -- sel will not be de -- filed.

lyrics.stanza: Daniel was a child like me Who purposed, yes, purposed in his heart, Daniel was a child like me Who purposed, yes, purposed in his heart. NO! NO! NO. NO. NO; My vessel will not be defiled. NO! NO! NO. NO. NO; My vessel will not be defiled.
